13 TomatoCoordinates pointcloud_processing::FitSphereInCloud(const sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 &input, pcl::PointXYZ roi, bool reset_rviz_cloud)
14 {
15  std::vector<float> coordinates;
16  pcl::PCLPointCloud2 pcl_pc2;
17  BAPointCloudPtr cloud(new BAPointCloud);
18  BAPointCloudPtr cloud_pass(new BAPointCloud);
19  BAPointCloudPtr cloud_filtered(new BAPointCloud);
20 
21  pcl_conversions::toPCL(input, pcl_pc2);
22  pcl::fromPCLPointCloud2(pcl_pc2, *cloud);
23 
24  pointcloud_processing::CropPointCloud(cloud, cloud_pass, roi);
25  pointcloud_processing::SegregatePlane(cloud_pass, cloud_filtered);
26  TomatoCoordinates tomato = pointcloud_processing::FitSphere(cloud_filtered);
27 
28 #ifdef BA_PCL_DEBUG
29  ROS_INFO("%s", "Model coefficients are: ");
30  ROS_INFO("%s %.3f", "\tcenter.x is: ", tomato.x);
31  ROS_INFO("%s %.3f", "\tcenter.y is: ", tomato.y);
32  ROS_INFO("%s %.3f", "\tcenter.z is: ", tomato.z);
33  ROS_INFO("%s %.3f m", "\tsphere radius is: ", tomato.r);
34 
35  static BAPointCloudPtr tomatoscene(new BAPointCloud);
36  if (reset_rviz_cloud)
37  {
38  *tomatoscene = *cloud_filtered;
39  }
40  else
41  {
42  *tomatoscene += *cloud_filtered;
43  }
44 
45  sensor_msgs::PointCloud2 out_msg;
46  pcl::toROSMsg(*tomatoscene, out_msg);
47  out_msg.header = input.header;
48  ros::Publisher tomato_publisher = ros::NodeHandle().advertise<sensor_msgs::PointCloud2>("tomato_clouds", 100, true);
49  tomato_publisher.publish(out_msg);
50  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
51  ROS_INFO("%s", "sending...");
52  for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)
53  {
54  tomato_publisher.publish(out_msg);
55  ros::spinOnce();
56  loop_rate.sleep();
57  }
58 #endif
59 
60  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
61  {
62  coordinates.push_back(0);
63  }
64  return tomato;
65 }

74 void pointcloud_processing::CropPointCloud(BAPointCloudPtr input, BAPointCloudPtr output, pcl::PointXYZ roi)
75 {
76  BAPointCloudPtr helper(new BAPointCloud);
77  pcl::PassThrough<pcl::PointXYZ> pass;
78 
79  // crop depth
80  pass.setInputCloud(input);
81  pass.setFilterFieldName("z");
82  pass.setFilterLimits(roi.z - BOX_SIZE / 2, roi.z + BOX_SIZE / 2);
83  pass.filter(*output);
84  // crop vertically
85  pass.setInputCloud(output);
86  pass.setFilterFieldName("y");
87  pass.setFilterLimits(roi.y - BOX_SIZE / 2, roi.y + BOX_SIZE / 2);
88  pass.filter(*helper);
89  // crop horizontally
90  pass.setInputCloud(helper);
91  pass.setFilterFieldName("x");
92  pass.setFilterLimits(roi.x - BOX_SIZE / 2, roi.x + BOX_SIZE / 2);
93  pass.filter(*output);
94 }
95 
102 void pointcloud_processing::SegregatePlane(BAPointCloudPtr input, BAPointCloudPtr output)
103 {
104  pcl::ModelCoefficients::Ptr coeffs(new pcl::ModelCoefficients);
105  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr inliers(new pcl::PointIndices);
106  pcl::SACSegmentation<pcl::PointXYZ> seg;
107  seg.setModelType(pcl::SACMODEL_PLANE);
108  seg.setMethodType(pcl::SAC_RANSAC);
109  seg.setDistanceThreshold(0.003);
110  seg.setInputCloud(input);
111  seg.segment(*inliers, *coeffs);
112 
113  pcl::ExtractIndices<pcl::PointXYZ> extract;
114  extract.setInputCloud(input);
115  extract.setIndices(inliers);
116  extract.setNegative(true);
117  extract.filter(*output);
118 }
119 
126 TomatoCoordinates pointcloud_processing::FitSphere(BAPointCloudPtr input)
127 {
128  std::vector<int> inliers;
129  pcl::SampleConsensusModelSphere<pcl::PointXYZ>::Ptr model_s(new pcl::SampleConsensusModelSphere<pcl::PointXYZ>(input));
130  pcl::RandomSampleConsensus<pcl::PointXYZ> ransac(model_s);
131  ransac.setDistanceThreshold(0.01);
132  ransac.computeModel();
133  ransac.getInliers(inliers);
134 
135  Eigen::VectorXf coeffs;
136  ransac.getModelCoefficients(coeffs);
137  TomatoCoordinates result = {coeffs[0], coeffs[1], coeffs[2], coeffs[3], false};
138  return result;
139 }
